code: import React from'react';import{AppBar,Toolbar,Typography,Button,Container,Box}from'@mui/material';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{logout}from'../../store/slices/authSlice';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const{user}=useSelector(state=>state.auth);const dispatch=useDispatch();const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogout=()=>{dispatch(logout());navigate('/login');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AppBar,{position:"static",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{maxWidth:"lg",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Toolbar,{disableGutters:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h6",noWrap:true,component:Link,to:"/dashboard",sx:{mr:2,display:{xs:'none',md:'flex'},fontWeight:700,letterSpacing:'.1rem',color:'inherit',textDecoration:'none'},children:"Product Inventory"}),user?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{flexGrow:1}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"body1",sx:{mr:2},children:[user.username," (",user.role,")"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{color:"inherit",onClick:handleLogout,children:"Logout"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{flexGrow:1}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{color:"inherit",component:Link,to:"/login",children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{color:"inherit",component:Link,to:"/register",children:"Register"})]})]})})});};export default Navbar;
